com.compendium.ui
Class UIImages

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.UIImages
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIConstants
public class UIImages
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIConstants

This class has method for retrieving image files or references from various directories.

Author:
Mohammed Sajid Ali / Michelle Bachler

createImageIcon

public static final javax.swing.ImageIcon createImageIcon(java.lang.String sImagePath)
Take the given file path and create an ImageIcon file from it. If it is a image on the web, load appropriately.

Parameters:
sImagePath - the path or URI of the image to load into an ImageIcon class.
Returns:
the Image icon, or null, if not successfully loaded.
